text:
-Archimedes Colony.
"Pillar of Light" upper level,
Ceremony Hall.

In that place, where the setting sun streamed in,
the traces of [Player]'s battle with the Kaibutsu remained.

name: Sui
text:
Crowne-san, Exio-san.
Look over here too.
There's a sword mark on the wall.

name: Crowne
text:
That's probably the work of
the villain who's with them.
Well, it's a helpful landmark for now.

name: Exio
text:
It seems that the floor above this
is the control room and the reactor's control facility.

name: Sui
text:
It's still a little further, then.
...Melide-chan, are you okay?

name: Melide
text:
...Yes, I'm fine.
Thank you, Sui-chan.
I was thinking I needed to get some exercise anyway.

Though a little out of breath,
Melide continued to climb the "Pillar of Light"
with the heroes.

name: Crowne
text:
...[Player] and the others
seem to have already boarded the elevator
and started the battle.

name: Sui
text:
...Hey, Exio-san.
It's fine if we talk while moving, but
could you tell me something?

name: Sui
text:
The method to defeat the Kaibutsu
and prevent the reactor from exploding...
Have you thought of anything?

At Sui's words, Exio, who was operating his terminal
while running, frowned and replied.

name: Exio
text:
...I've thought of
one possible method-

name: Exio
text:
No, to be precise, it's a method
where the possibility is 'not zero'.

Exio muttered the words
under his breath.

name: Exio
text:
...I never expected to fight Kaibutsu
in a "superimposed state,"
that was also unexpected.

name: Sui
text:
Speaking of which, Exio-san,
you said you encountered Kaibutsu
in a similar state before, didn't you?

name: Sui
text:
At that time, how did you
defeat an enemy in a "superimposed state"?

Exio shook his head,
his expression unchanged.

name: Exio
text:
...I 'couldn't defeat it'.
I'll spare you the details, but at that time,
I couldn't do anything.

name: Exio
text:
The Kaibutsu, having assimilated with an
almost inexhaustible amount of Ether bodies, were as if
it had its entire existance strongly reinforced.

name: Exio
text:
No matter how hard I tried to destroy the core,
I couldn't break the situation where the "existence"
in this universe was endlessly reinforced.

name: Exio
text:
Even if I barely managed to damage the Kaibutsu's core,
it would immediately recover or revive...

name: Exio
text:
Just by that one Kaibutsu,
an entire city... No, most of a planet,
was easily destroyed.

name: Melide
text: Exio-sama, does that mean...?

name: Exio
text:
...Yes.
So, I don't know any effective
means to definitely defeat it.

name: Crowne
text:
T-Then, against such an opponent,
how are we supposed to fight...?

name: Exio
text:
Right, let's organize the situation
a little as I explain.

name: Exio
text:
First, the biggest problem is that
the Kaibutsu and the reactor,
these two are "superimposed".

name: Exio
text:
—Melide.
If the superposition is the problem,
what do you think we should do?

Exio took Melide's hand,
helping her move forward,
and asked her.

name: Melide
text:
Then, I think it would be good to
separate them...

name: Melide
text:
If the two of them could be
separated, then that problem
would be resolved, wouldn't it...?

Exio nodded and replied
that she was correct.

name: Exio
text:
As Melide says, normally,
if two objects are in a superimposed state,
you can simply separate them.

name: Exio
text:
You can imagine like separating things from
the gaps or tears between the objects.
'That' is the goal.

name: Exio
text:
...But the problem is that the "superimposed
state" of the Kaibutsu and the Ether bodies
is not merely a physical fusion.

name: Exio
text:
It's a state where it's 'not yet determined of
which universe it exists in'.
That is "superposition".

Exio chose his words carefully
as he spoke, as if organizing his thoughts.

name: Exio
text:
The "superimposed" state is normally
very delicate and fragile. It's difficult
to maintain that state.

name: Exio
text:
If someone opens a box and confirms it,
at that moment, its "existence or non-existence"
in this universe is determined—

name: Exio
text:
In other words, the collapse of "superposition"
can be triggered by 'observation', through interaction
with this universe... Theoretically, that is.

name: Crowne
text:
I see, losing the coherence of the
"superimposed state" and determining its state...
The principle is similar to the warp this time, isn't it?

Sui confirmed the surrounding safety,
and ruminated on Exio's and Crowne's words.

name: Sui
text:
Uhm, it's normally unstable, so
it should be easy to undo the
"superimposed" state, but—

name: Sui
text:
This time, because of the reactor,
we can't break that state... Is that right?

name: Sui
text:
Exio-san said it just now, didn't he?
That it has a strongly reinforced existence, because
it assimilated with a large amount of Ether bodies.

name: Exio
text:
Ah, that's just my assessment.
It's maintaining the "superposition" state just
with the power of Ether's affirmation—

name: Exio
text:
This, doesn't it remind you of the logic
by which an "Observer" transforms heroes?

name: Exio
text:
An "Observer" connects a path, and by observing, they
superimpose and fix their own self in this universe
with their supposed form in a parallel universe
(themselves in a hero suit).

name: Exio
text:
...Then, how would you
cancel a hero's transformation?

name: Melide
text:
The "Observer" would simply
stop observing, wouldn't they?
...Ah!

Melide, comprehending what Exio was trying to convey,
let out a small gasp of surprise.

name: Exio
text:
Yes, if we apply this to the
current Kaibutsu and reactor situation—

name: Exio
text:
If we could somehow weaken the surrounding Ether
that is strengthening the Kaibutsu's existence,
then there would be a chance of victory.

name: Crowne
text:
The logic is the same as when an "Observer"'s
observation becomes unstable, and the transformed
hero's power weakens, huh? I see.

Exio nodded quietly and
returned his gaze to the path ahead.

name: Exio
text:
Based on this premise,
[Player]'s power—

name: Exio
text:
If they could skillfully apply the influence of
the swirling Ether around them, a fluctuation
should occur in the "superimposed" state.

name: Exio
text:
Then, once a fluctuation occurs,
then it's the same as the first story.
They just need to widen that crack.

name: Exio
text:
Weapons that can interfere with parallel universes—
That is, Parallel Weapons,
might be able to do that.

name: Sui
text:
B-But, Exio-san.
The power that makes Ether
swirl around [Player]-san—

name: Sui
text:
Is it something that can be
controlled by their own will...?

name: Crowne
text:
...Besides, even if that were possible,
you'd be attacking the fluctuating Kaibutsu
with a Parallel Weapon, right?

name: Crowne
text:
To aim precisely at a fluctuation
like that, and attack it...

name: Crowne
text:
If you miss even a little,
the reactor will explode,
and a major disaster is inevitable, isn't it?

In front of the running group,
the entrance to the control room came into view.

name: Exio
text:
...Ah, that's right.
If even one of them fails,
we won't get out unscathed.

name: Exio
text:
The chance of success is not even
1%, so I can't guarantee it—

Exio, without stopping, called out
to his terminal.

His voice communication was being broadcast
simultaneously to the heroes and operators
fighting together in the "Pillar of Light".

name: Exio
text:
—I hope you can hear me,
[Player]-kun.
This is my idea.

Standing on the elevator platform,
floating in space,
[Player] responded.
And, before their eyes—

A giant, matured Kaibutsu stood in their way,
enveloped in an ominous aura.

name: Orbiter
text:
...[Player],
T-This Kaibutsu is completely different
from the ones we've seen so far...!

name: Gaisei
text:
F-Fufufu...!
Ah, [Player]-dono.
As expected, it was good to believe in you.

Gaisei laughed more gleefully than ever before,
and removed the mask that covered his face.

name: Gaisei
text:
An intimidating aura that stings the skin...
To be given the opportunity to confront
such overwhelming power!

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...Everyone, please be very careful.
Yotaro, please direct Gaisei
so he doesn't get too far ahead.

name: Yotaro
text:
Yes, understood.
Gaisei-kun seems to be getting excited,
so I'll keep an eye on him.

Pubraseer glared at the Kaibutsu
with a stern gaze.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...Its movements are clumsy,
and it doesn't seem to be able to move as fast
as the larvae on the ground.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...We can't let our guard down, but the enemy
doesn't seem to be used to the zero-gravity
vacuum environment of space yet.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Orbiter, can you deploy a gravity field
around the Kaibutsu now
to restrict its movements?

name: Orbiter
text:
Understood. I'll try, Captain.
...But a field that big
might not last very long...

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Just being able to stop it is enough.
Originally, I intended to search
for that Kaibutsu's weakness.

Orbiter nodded at Pubraseer's words
and deployed a giant gravity field
around the Kaibutsu.

The Kaibutsu's clumsy movements
were further restricted.

name: Orbiter
text:
...It's too big,
I can't increase the gravity's
intensity any further...!

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Thank you, Orbiter.
...Alright, if we're going to have a final strategy meeting,
now's the only time.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
About what we just discussed...
[Player], can you really manipulate Ether?

[Player] shook their head in response
to Pubraseer.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...I see.
In that case, we should
explore other methods.

name: Yotaro
text:
There's also the problem of landing
Parallel Weapon attacks on the fluctuations...

name: Yotaro
text:
If we attack the Kaibutsu's main body,
we're in danger too.
It's essential that we think of measures.

name: Gaisei
text:
I don't think any measures are available,
other than attempting to attack in this empty space.
May I try my own skills first?

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...No, stop, Gaisei.
Careless actions could even take away
the lives of the people living in the colony.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
But, if things remain like this,
we'll have no choice but to destroy it...
...[Player], could you tell me what you're thinking?

As [Player] stammered and
looked down, their terminal
announced an incoming call.

name: Huckle
text:
—[Player]-kun, can you hear me?
I heard Exio-san's story.

name: Huckle
text:
...Despite that, just one thing.
There's something I absolutely want to tell you.

name: Huckle
text:
To seek a solution that doesn't sacrifice anyone
that you want to protect, right up until the very end...
I'd like you to remember and keep that promise.

name: Huckle
text:
...You have believed in a miraculous possibility,
less than 1%, and observed by our side until now.

name: Huckle
text:
So now, with us by
your side, [Player]-kun—

name: Huckle
text:
It is time for us,
to believe in you, our Operator,
us heroes' greatest partner.

name: Huckle
text:
...[Player]-kun.
Please... Please stay safe.
That's all I have to say.

The next moment, incoming calls streamed
one after another to [Player]'s terminal.

name: Akashi
text:
—[Player]!
You're not hurt, are you!?

name: Akashi
text:
You, you're overdoing it again, aren't you!?
...You absolutely must come back safely!
I'll make you tell me everything that happened!

name: Mokdai
text:
Akashi was very worried.
...[Player], please, be very careful.

name: Mokdai
text:
We'll be waiting while carrying out rescue operations.
The people you rescued from the Kaibutsu have
safely regained consciousness, so please rest assured!

name: Monomasa
text:
...I'll be waiting for your return.
I swear to protect this place
for that purpose, at all costs.

name: Justice
text:
[Player]!
I won't say much!!
Leave this side to us!!!

name: Justice
text:
To protect everyone's ordinary daily lives—
You, must carry out the justice you believe in!!!!

name: Andrew
text:
[Player]-san,
I'll also fight with all my might here!
Orbiter, let's do our best together!

name: Flamier
text:
We too, will exert every effort we can.
Please, save this colony...
Together with us.

name: Denebola
text:
[Player], I've successfully rejoined.
You too, be careful.

name: Hydoor
text:
Damn it, you're always in trouble, aren't you!
Hurry up, finish it and come back!
If you don't come back, I'm gonna give you a good punch!

name: Subaru
text:
The defense of the "Pillar of Light" has more
than enough forces, so please rest assured.
We're counting on you to do, what only you can do.

name: Yoshiori
text:
Hey, [Player]!
I won't say anything unnecessary,
just survive! That's all!

The heroes fighting the Kaibutsu
on the ground cheered for [Player].

name: Exio
text:
—It seems that we
made it in time.

name: Melide
text:
I wonder if you can hear us.
Just now, we've reached
the entrance of the elevator!

name: Sui
text:
[Player]-san,
since then, Exio-san and I
have devised a plan.

Sui put her hand to her chest,
and explained while regulating her breathing.

name: Sui
text:
[Player]-san, your power to make Ether swirl...
How to make it affect the opponent.

name: Crowne
text:
The principle is simple.
If the Ether is swirling
around you as its axis—

name: Crowne
text:
[Player], if you yourself move quickly enough,
the axis of the swirl will shift.

name: Crowne
text:
That way, you can
manipulate the Ether virtually, right?

name: Exio
text:
...But, the Ether possessed by the reactor
is an enormous amount.

name: Exio
text:
Moving around a little bit
won't be enough to achieve
the desired manipulation.

name: Crowne
text:
...That's where
this guy comes in.

Crowne, who had apparently repaired it,
lightly tapped the assembled small spaceship
and showed it to them.

name: Orbiter
text:
Oh, my spaceship!
It's working again!?

name: Crowne
text:
Ah, repairs are complete!
I even added an autopilot function,
so I can send it to your coordinates right away!

name: Crowne
text:
...How about it, [Player].
This is an incredible 'gamble', but-

name: Crowne
text:
How about trying to fly freely
through space with it?

name: Yotaro
text:
...According to what we just discussed,
[Player]'s power seems to be the key.

name: Yotaro
text:
...What will you do?
It's like a gamble... A plan with
a success rate of maybe, one percent.

The seemingly nonchalant voice
of Yotaro also contained a hint of anxiety.
At those words, [Player]—

options.text: ...Even so, we have no choice but to do it.
Whatever the chance, we just need to succeed.

text:
[Player] gazed straight at the Kaibutsu
and replied to Yotaro.

name: Yotaro
text:
...[Player].
You are truly strong.

name: Yotaro
text:
If you were a hero, you might be able to use the power
of a Parallel Weapon to deal with it, but—

name: Yotaro
text:
We, "Observers",
if something were to happen...
We wouldn't stand a chance.

name: Yotaro
text:
............
...Aren't you scared?

[Player] shook their
head at Yotaro's question.

options.text: I want to run away right now.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
—[Player].
Ah, I knew you'd say that.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...It's alright.
I will definitely be with you.

name: Orbiter
text:
[Player], I'll ride the
spaceship with you too!

name: Orbiter
text:
It might be a little cramped...
But I can pilot it, so leave it to me!

name: Orbiter
text:
...It's okay!
If we're together, we can definitely do it!

name: Crowne
text:
...The discussion seems to be settled.
Then, I'll send it over right away!
Please receive it properly!

name: Sui
text:
Oh, wait, Crowne-san!
I'll reinforce the hull with my thread.

Connecting all the parts that everyone had collected,
the small spaceship was repaired.

That tiny spaceship was firmly
bound together by Sui's thread.

name: Crowne
text:
Thank you, Sui.
—Then, let's launch this guy up!
We're going in 3 counts.

name: All
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">3—

name: All
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">2—

name: All
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">1—

name: Orbiter
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">Lift-off!!

The completed [Orbiter] proceeded straight into space
through the elevator shaft.

The name for the "spaceship" was actually オービター号 (Orbiter-go),
with 号 standing for mark, issue, number, etc...
I don't want to butcher it, so I just left it as is.
You could tell me what you think is a proper name, though!

Drawing a straight trajectory,
everyone's interconnected hopes
rushed towards [Player].

Chapter 8:
Overlapping Bonds - Part 2

—[Player] calmly
steadied their breathing.

To not be disturbed by the
presence of the Kaibutsu before them,
they sensed the surrounding Ether.

It was slowly, yet
powerfully, swirling in a massive vortex
that seemed to engulf its surroundings.

Ether could be felt shimmering
and floating all around, sparkling.

name: Orbiter
text:
—Oh, it's here-!!
It's my spaceship-!!

Orbiter looked down to the
colony's ceiling and pointed.

name: Orbiter
text:
[Player], send me
ViewPower!

name: Orbiter
text:
I'll deploy a gravity field
so you can board!

At [Player]'s signal,
Orbiter spread his arms wide.

name: Orbiter
text:
Let's fly endlessly
through this cosmos together!

name: Orbiter
text:
—"Adventure"!
Gravity Well!!

Orbiter's spaceship moved towards them,
akin to being sucked into the generated gravity field.

And the moment it touched the field,
it rapidly decelerated and stopped moving.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
—Now, [Player]!
Board with Orbiter!

At Pubraseer's words,
the two nodded and leaped
into the spaceship, embracing it.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
—I shall guide you
all the way!

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
It's my job to support my dear friends!
—"Polaris"!
Pénte Anamniseis!!

Pubraseer's Parallel Weapon
was filled with light, enveloping Orbiter and [Player].

name: Orbiter
text:
[Player], grab on to my body!
—Here we go, [Orbiter], launch!

Immediately regaining his posture,
Orbiter gripped the control stick.

And, receiving Pubraseer's power,
the spaceship gently lifted off
from the elevator.

Orbiter and [Player]
began to move rapidly through space.

—Just then, the gravity field
enveloping the Kaibutsu reached its limit.

Like shattering glass,
the field broke into pieces
and vanished into specks of light.

name: Giant Engine-type Kaibutsu
text: —Vooooohhhhhh!!

And, as if it was finally freed,
the colossal Kaibutsu let out
a roaring cry.

name: Orbiter
text:
—Ah-!
My field...!

name: Yotaro
text:
...Finally, it's moving.
There's no time left.

name: Yotaro
text:
We have to suppress the Kaibutsu until
[Player] creates a fluctuation in the Ether!

name: Gaisei
text:
Finally, it's my own turn to move.
Ah... I've been longing for this.

name: Gaisei
text:
Overwhelming physique, an intimidating presence that pierces the skin.
I am most pleased that I can enjoy myself to the fullest.
Come, show me your power...!

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
[Player], Orbiter!
Both of you, I'm counting on you!
Leave this side to me.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Come, Kaibutsu!
I won't let you lay a hand on my friends!
...We are your opponents!

name: Orbiter
text:
Captain, everyone...!
...Let's go, [Player]!

At Orbiter's words,
[Player] nodded.

Orbiter gripped the control stick tightly
and maximized the spaceship's engine output.

The [Orbiter] accelerated further.
It circled around the colossal Kaibutsu,
swirling like a vortex.

Due to Orbiter's gravity manipulation, there
was almost no strain on their bodies. They sped
through cosmos sea like fish swimming freely.

[Player] closed their eyes,
leaning their body against Orbiter,
and focused their consciousness even further.

The Ether was moving.
The surrounding sensations were different from usual.

The sensation of massive amounts of Ether flowing
from the reactor rushing through their surroundings.
It was like a meteor shower—
'The flow of Ether changes'.

[Player] opened their eyes and
glared at the Kaibutsu.
Its appearance was-

A fluctuation occurred, as if a 'discrepancy' had arisen
between the reactor's energy body and the Kaibutsu's core.

name: Orbiter
text:
[Player]!
Soon, the spaceship...!

The rapidly moving [Orbiter],
perhaps unable to withstand the strain,
emitted small blue sparks.

Orbiter nodded and turned the rudder.
Then, he rapidly approached Pubraseer and the others.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
-Gh!
The hope entrusted by my friends
will not break so easily!

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
We are the ones who will
pioneer everyone's future...!

name: Yotaro
text:
A-As expected, the attack is powerful...!
At this rate, we can't
hold out much longer...!

name: Gaisei
text:
...Strength is for achieving one's purpose.
That is the same for humans
as it is for Kaibutsu.

name: Gaisei
text:
If that thing tries to devour me with force,
then I will simply become a demon with full power.
I will simply demonstrate my reason for existence with force and skill...!

name: Yotaro
text:
—Both of you, behind you.
[Player] and the others are back!

name: Orbiter
text:
-Captain, everyone, are you alright!?
I'll lend a hand in the battle too!

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Ah, thank you, Orbiter!
...How is it, [Player]?
Were you able to manipulate the Ether...?

At Pubraseer's words, [Player] nodded.
There was no cloudiness in their eyes.

name: Yotaro
text:
Indeed, the flow of Ether has changed, but
has a fluctuation occurred in the enemy?
I can't tell, but...

Yotaro turned his gaze to the Kaibutsu, but
it didn't seem to have changed from before.

[Player] placed their hand on
their chest and closed their eyes.

The days of fighting Kaibutsu and villains,
the sensation of connecting paths,
the memory of observing someone's parallel universe—

As an "Observer" and Operator, the memories of
experiences cultivated alongside heroes surfaced.

[Player], who had overcome countless crises,
had indeed been growing step by step.

—When they opened their eyes,
they could even see the slightest fluctuation
that had occurred in the Kaibutsu.

At [Player]'s words,
the four quietly nodded to each other.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
—Ah, of course.
[Player], let's fight together,
bearing the hope entrusted to us.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...However, the enemy is formidable.
There will likely only be one chance
to attack at the moment it fluctuates.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
To my friends who have supported me... And to my
new friends, I will surely live up to your expectation.
That is my- The way I shall use this life!

name: Gaisei
text:
[Player]-dono,
it is an honor to share a supreme feast
with you under your command.

name: Gaisei
text:
Come, please make full use of me!
With all my power and skill, I shall show you
a moment of bliss to enjoy...!

name: Yotaro
text:
After a brief skirmish, you said attacking
would cause an explosion, but we might not even
be able to scratch it in the first place.

name: Yotaro
text:
Until a good opportunity comes, we should
maneuver skillfully while feinting.
...I'll help out too.

name: Yotaro
text:
Either way, there's no turning back.
It's like "the die has been cast".
...Let us go all out!

name: Orbiter
text:
I'm sure we'll be fine.
No matter how difficult...
We can overcome it!

name: Orbiter
text:
[Player], I'll fight too!
Together, we can surely do it!!

Nodding strongly, [Player]
began the battle operation.

—Facing a formidable enemy, still.
They simply gazed straight ahead, at the hope connecting
them together, at the backs of their comrades.
Battle Start

The following text is displayed right inside the battle,
so for the best experience, I'd recommend opening the game right beside it!
(please don't mind the wrong background, it's an animated background in the game)
[Trigger condition: End of Turn 1]

name: Orbiter
text:
—N-Not even a scratch, it seems!?
W-What should we do...!?

name: Gaisei
text:
...Oh, this hardness.
As expected of a matured form.
It's a world apart from before.

name: Yotaro
text:
Just as we heard, huh...
[Player], please concentrate on
observing the fluctuation!

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
We will protect you...!
To answer the hope entrusted to us,
we will not give up until the very last moment!
[Trigger condition: End of Turn 3]

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Guh...!
The attack's power is too high!
Are you alright, Orbiter!?

name: Orbiter
text:
...Ugh!
I-I'm fine... Captain!
I can still fight!

name: Gaisei
text:
...To this extent, huh!?
Ah... I want to defeat it!
I am still... not satisfied...!

name: Yotaro
text:
Gaisei-kun, don't overdo it!
...But, this destructive power.
At this rate, it'll be—

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
W-What is this...?
Is [Player]'s sensation being shared!?

name: Orbiter
text:
I-I can see it too!!
You're amazing, [Player]!

name: Gaisei
text:
...This is [Player]-dono's power...!
It's magnificent...!!

name: Yotaro
text:
It's what you call "amazement"...!
That's the fluctuation...!
So, it's the enemy's weakness, right!?

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
—Alright! We managed to separate
the Kaibutsu and the reactor!
Everyone, you did well!

name: Orbiter
text:
Gravity field deployed!
With this, the Kaibutsu shouldn't be able
to get close to the reactor anymore!

name: Yotaro
text:
It's what you call "perfect"!
Now we can attack to our heart's content!
We no longer need to hold back!

name: Gaisei
text:
Ah, my body is seething and aching...!
Now, let's continue the dance...!

options.text: Now all that's left is to defeat the Kaibutsu!
Everyone, let's finish this in one go!

text: [Trigger condition: Enemy HP falls below 25%?]

options.text: I c-can still... fight with you!

name: Orbiter
text:
...A-Are you alright, [Player]!?
You seem really tired...!

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
You've done so much observation.
...For [Player]'s sake too,
let's quickly end this, everyone!

name: Yotaro
text:
Last push, huh.
Gaisei-kun, let's end this!

name: Gaisei
text:
It is quite regrettable,
but the climax of a feast
is always at its end.

name: Gaisei
text:
With all my might,
let us proceed to the grand finale...!
—A white light enveloped everything.

The sparkling light overflowed
from the fading Kaibutsu.

The elevator platform,
unable to withstand the recoil of the attack,
was blown to smithereens into the beyond of light.

Throwing themselves into a desperate struggle
until the very last moment, the heroes, the villains.
—And, the Operator.

Everyone was enveloped in the Ether's light,
and could no longer see anything.

The defeated Kaibutsu transformed into specks of light.
Losing their form, they vanished while sparkling.
When the light subsided—

As he drifted away in space,
Orbiter's fingertip twitched.

name: Orbiter
text:
...U-Uhm...
I-I...
I can still move... Right.

name: Orbiter
text:
-T-The Kaibutsu, we defeated it.
We did it... We did it-!
Hey, [Player], Captain-

Even after quickly looking around,
no other people could be seen.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Captain, [Player]...?
W-Where...?
Gaisei and Yotaro too...!

Orbiter frantically regained his balance
in the zero-gravity space.

Then, while straining his eyes at his surroundings,
he swam through the sea of stars,
searching for Pubraseer and the others.

name: Orbiter
text:
—Oh, is that
perhaps, [Player]...?

He found a familiar human shape
in the shadow drifting in space,
and quickly headed towards it.

-It was an Operator,
who had used up all their strength,
and lay unconscious in a tattered state.

name: Orbiter
text:
...[Player]!
A-Are you alright...!?
I'll treat you right away—

Orbiter called out.
...But, there was no response.

When he released [Player]'s hand,
which he had been unconsciously gripping tightly,
it floated away gently.

name: Orbiter
text: [Player]—

The moment he saw that figure,
fragmented memories flowed
into Orbiter's mind.

—He heard someone's voice.
A familiar voice that he should know.
But it was also an unfamiliar voice.

『—In my place,
I want you to travel the vast cosmos.』

Another voice replied to that voice.
—He knew this voice.
It was the same voice as "the person in his heart".

name: Person in the Heart
text:
『I apologize.
I cannot travel.
Please, stay here.』

『...I'm sorry, Orbiter.
I've already decided.』

Someone was quietly muttering.
He has already known this scene—
『Yoo-hoo, Orbiter.』

It was a nostalgic voice,
that he called "the person in his heart".

—For some reason,
it made his chest felt very tight.

『Disconnect neuro-interface.
Power down the suit.』

name: Person in the Heart
text:
『—Warning. Severe problems may occur as a risk.
Are you sure you want to proceed?』

『...Proceed.
Thank you for everything so far.
—Orbiter.』

—And he remembered.
What came after these words.

Someone was in front of him.
...He couldn't remember their face or form.
Yet, he remembered them as a person precious to him.

And that person,
smiled quietly and let go of their hand.
Like that, they gently floated away-

That someone's voice, "the person in his heart",
that he never understood...
But, he does know one thing.

He never managed
to save that person—

name: Orbiter
text:
...I have to protect them.
This time, I have to protect them...!!

Amidst his jumbled memories,
Orbiter looked up.

name: Orbiter
text: ...[Player].

This time, before losing them.
—He knew it himself.
They have already been too far gone.

...But, he doesn't want to lose anyone else.
He don't want anyone to disappear,
or to be unable to protect them—
Orbiter quietly embraced [Player].
